text: Aro'o smarana karo! Amara tadera upare parbatake kampita karalama ta yena hayechila ekati acchadana, ara tara bhebechila ye e niscaya'i tadera upare bhenge pareche, ''amara tomadera ya diyechi ta drrhabhabe akamre dharo, ara tate ya rayeche ta smarana rekho, yate tomara dharmabhiruta abalanbana karo’’.
